What exactly does the activator exe do? I ask because I play on a Mac and am wondering if I can manually do the changes on my Mac to get the DLC to work.

Can anybody help me? I've tried this several times now, and the error I always get is that the Launcher doesn't show ANY dlc... And if I click on "Start CKII", it will come up with an error and won't let me load the game anyway.

What I did:
- downloaded base game Crusader Kings II from Skidrow and installed it
- downloaded patch 1.092 and installed it (overwrote when prompted)
- placed the DLC folder from this download into the game directory
- placed the activator from this download into the game directory, launched it
- the game crashed, as expected
- started the game from the launcher and this is where I got the problem: no DLC at all, and the game wouldn't start anyway.

Can somebody please tell me what am I doing wrong?

Daphoenyx try installing skidrows version then install skidrows #2 patch then use official update (well not past 1.092 i would imagine unless you use the latest dlc torrent i uploaded then 1.10) then after that do your last 3 steps if dlc does not show up in-game use activator again may take up to several tries
